title: #89: Burying The Lead of The Keepers
description:
The #RCP team arc the last episode of the award winning Netflix show The Keepers. This episode will make you swear and curse - if you haven't been doing so already. We find out about the first victim, Charles Franz, whose mother reported the abuse to the Catholic Church (no doubt there are more). Hence the Church knew Maskell was a serial perpetrator before Jean came forward. We discuss Maskell's behaviour in Northern Ireland, serial abusers and the investigation into Joyce Malecki's murder and so much more.


#HerNameWasCathy

#HerNameWasJoyce

#HisNameISCharles
